thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fanastic hotel
thread.title_full: Fanastic hotel - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Alex D
title: Fanastic hotel
text:
Location was incredible, hotel was the cleanest we've ever stayed in, the staff were so friendly and lovely (offering to help with suggestions of where is best to eat, how long it took to get to the tourist attractions, and information about the transport to name a few), the food upstairs on the fifth floor was so good, and the drinks were just as nice. Finally our room was amazing!
They provide free water which is also a bonus on top of the coffee & tea.
The hotel also had some minor work going on so we even got a free box of biscuits :-)
We would definitely stay in this hotel and recommend it to everyone we know- and we could not fault it even if we tried!
If you stay in Rome, you need to stay here!
